requirements.summary: Create Landing Page with Hero Section featuring large product hero image, headline, subtext, action buttons, and smooth scroll animation

Configure Tailwind theme with Apple-inspired design tokens: Inter font family, custom color palette (white, soft gray, one accent), consistent border radius values, soft shadow definitions, and generous spacing scale. Set default transition timing for smooth animations.

file_operations.description: Create custom React hook for scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer. Support fade-in, slide-up, and scale effects with configurable thresholds and delays. Return visibility state and ref for component attachment.
